title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 227 - Approval Of Types Of Gas Meters And Accessories
content:

State Regulations
§ 227.1 - Definitions
§ 227.2 - Selection of devices for approval
§ 227.3 - Application for approval
§ 227.4 - Modification of approved devices
§ 227.5 to 227.15 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 227

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16 [1], 20[1], 67

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
